document_data.name: Mistress Ada
document_data.mainbody:
'''Mistress Ada''' was a ranking red-headed [[priestess]] in service of the [[Church of Talos]] of [[Athkatla]]'s [[Athkatla/Temple District|Temple District]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Chaos prevail! Do you require the services of Talos?''|Mistress Ada}}
document_data.Possessions: Ada wore a set of [[splint mail]] and carried a hefty [[club]]. A heavy ''[[necklace of Talos]]'' hung from her chest, displaying her affiliation with the Stormlord's church.
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Mistress Ada could be found in the great [[Temple of Talos (Athkatla)|Temple of Talos]], guarded by [[Storm Knight]]s while performing daily tasks of a ranking priestess, providing services to visitors, and exchanging [[enchanted]] items, protection [[scroll]]s, and [[potion]]s for donations to the temple. The same year, Ada was targeted by [[Mae'Var]], one of the [[Shadow Thieves]] of Athkatla. Mae'Var sought to steal the ''necklace of Talos''.
